thread.title_full: Ibori ya dawo Najeriya bayan shekaru 4 a gidan yarin Birtaniya - Afrika - RFI

author: Awwal Ahmad Janyau
title: Ibori ya dawo Najeriya bayan shekaru 4 a gidan yarin Birtaniya - Afrika - RFI

organizations.name: jihar delta james ibori ya dawo najeriya

text:
Wanda aka canza zuwa 04-02-2017 A 17:49 A watan Disemba aka saki James Ibori a London REUTERS 
Tsohon gwamnan Jihar Delta James Ibori ya dawo Najeriya a yau Asabar bayan shafe shekaru sama da hudu yana gidan yari a Birtaniya kan laifin rashawa. 
A watan Afrilun 2012 ne Kotun Birtaniya ta yanke wa Ibori hukuncin daurin shekaru 13 a gidan yari tare da kwace dukiyarsa da suka kunshi motocin kasaita da gidaje. 
Amma a karkashin hukuncin Ibori zai yi rabin shekarun ne a gidan yari. A yau ne kuma ya iso Abuja kafin ya tafi jiharsa Delta a kudancin Najeriya. 
An Kama Ibori da laifin halatta kudaden haramun da suka kai fam miliyan 50, inda ya tsere zuewa Dubai kafin a mika shi ga mahukuntan Birtaniya.
